attributes.action: make Sky provide broadband and Sky Talk within 30 days of ordering it instead of the months that it takes for most of their customers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Sky seem unable to provide any other service except TV. If they cant provide the broadband and phone calls within 30 days of an order being placed, they should refund the customer £50 for every month they fail to provide the service

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
